attributes.action: Help Stop repossession of homes to people thats unemployed due to the current recession through no fault of there own?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have been currently unemployed now for nearly 6 months due to the current decline of our economy and i have never once missed a payment on our mortgage until 3 months ago. both my self and my wife along with our three daughters one of which is only 12 months old is facing evication of our mortgaged home through no fault of our own as we owe 3 months arrears for which we cant afford to pay as we only get £258.00 per month of the state to live on. my wife does work but she only gets around £500 per month for for work around 140 hours  for which we have to pay all our other mounting debts and day to day living needs from.

rejection.details:
Phillip, We suggest you look into the Government's Mortgage Support Scheme: http://realhelpnow.gov.uk/?page_id=54
You may be eligible for support. 
E-petitions team.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
